## \_isDateInDateRange() function

Check if a date is contained in a date range.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _isDateInDateRange(date: Immutable<Maybe<DateInput>>, dateRange: Immutable<Partial<DateRange>>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | Immutable&lt;Maybe&lt;DateInput&gt;&gt; | A date input that should be checked |
|  dateRange | Immutable&lt;Partial&lt;[DateRange](./date-time-helpers.daterange.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt; | A date range the date should be contained in |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Returns true if the date is contained in the date range, else false.
